item.title: ZeroMQ Quiz, Part 3
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: ! W O R K ~ I N ~ P R O G R E S S ! This page contains questions & answers based on the ZeroMQ Guide written by Pieter Hintjens. Quiz 1 What aspects of control vs data flow when designing a protocol? What aspect of messaging is important when talking about performance? What aspect of messaging is affected by ‘the cost of serialisation’? What are some examples of simple self-describing structured encodings?

Why use PAIR sockets rather than PUB / SUB sockets? Show Answers 1. ”> ROUTER wraps your message in an ““envelope”“, meaning a zero-size signal message turns into a multipart message.

item.title: ZeroMQ Quiz, Part 1

item.description: ! W O R K ~ I N ~ P R O G R E S S ! This page contains questions & answers based on the ZeroMQ Guide written by Pieter Hintjens. Quiz 1 Give an example of load balancing. Give an example of fair queuing. What is the slow joiner problem? What must you do when you use a SUB socket? What happens if you don’t set any subscriptions on a SUB socket?
